unnormalised: Arey yaar, I don't know much about labor law, but doesn't the Minimum Wages Act, 1948 say something about this? Seems like the factory owner is trying to pay less than Rs. 350/day to these workers in Tamil Nadu. I heard Adv. Sharma mention something about it on TV. Maybe file a case under Section 14 of the Act? Just a thought!
normalised: Arey yaar, I do not know much about labor law, but does not the Minimum Wages Act, one thousand nine hundred and forty eight say something about this? Seems like the factory owner is trying to pay less than rupees three hundred and fifty per day to these workers in Tamil Nadu. I heard Advocate Sharma mention something about it on T-V. Maybe file a case under Section fourteen of the Act? Just a thought!
